name: Total Rampage
description:
Gameplay

Total Rampage is a retro arcade shooter where you must collect power-ups to become more powerful and defeat enemies.

Controls W, A, S, DUp, Left, Down, Right. Double tapping any of these keys will cause you to dash, gaining immunity while doing so.SpacebarShoot Power-Ups Faster GunIncreases your rate of fireBaseball BatYour gun does +1 damage, maximum of 3 damageAxeYour gun does +2 damage, maximum of 3 damageBandageHeals 1 healthMedkitHeals 2 healthGrenadeCauses you to enter Rampage Mode. You move much faster and kill all enemies with one shot
